snippet: Against the backdrop of a sputtering recovery, economists said benign inflation gave the Federal Reserve room to ease further at its policy meeting next week.
lead_paragraph: Against the backdrop of a sputtering recovery, economists said benign inflation gave the Federal Reserve room to ease further at its policy meeting next week.

headline.main: Import Prices Fell 1% in May, as Food and Energy Costs Ebbed
headline.print_headline: Import Prices Fell 1% in May, as Food and Energy Costs Ebbed
